channel.title: defjaf tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from defjaf.

item.description:
@WKCosmo @skdh “Everything is quantum mechanical, all of the time” is a good slogan, but what does it mean? Decoherence drives systems to near classicality, but off-diagonal terms in the density matrix are still non-zero.
@WKCosmo @skdh But they aren’t zero, so why isn’t the burden on you to show why that has no observational consequences? Or you have just re-invented many-worlds branches.
